Posts.Title: CALLING ALL STAGE I SISTERS sheila888 MCBaker

Posts.Content: Jaebon wrote: Hello everyone,  I started my first chemo on April 12,2012. I am on day 8 and so far have expierenced min side affects. I did have body aches and flu like symptoms on the 2nd day. Today was a great day as i did my first 5K run/walk today.  I guess my question is , has anyone expierenced not loosing their hair. I keep reading that most people start sheding or loosing around 2-3 weeks after they start.  So far i have not noticed anything  with ny hair shedding.  I guess if i am going to  start it will start sometime next week or perhaps after my second round of chemo.  I guess the anticipation of it all is driving me crazy. Also is it common for most people to have min side affects like me?  Dx 3/22/2012, ILC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 2, 0/3 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: taxotere/cytoxan ? Jaebon Lumpynme

Posts.Content: Apr 22, 2012 01:46PM Jaebon wrote: Thank you momof3boys. Your info was very helpful. I know i have prob asked about the hair lost thing on this board before but i just wondered if their was anyone who did nit loose it at all.  I guess the hair loss worries me the most. All my other symotoms like the body aches or flu like symptoms  i pretty much dealt with well. It is this next one with the hair loss that im not sure how to handle. Yes i know it will grow back, but im still trying to deal with or process the emotions behind it coming out. Again thsnk you fir your response. I was beginning to think no one would give me a response, prob since ive asked before. Anyway, have a great day.
Posts.Title: taxotere/cytoxan ? Jaebon Lumpynme

Posts.Content: Apr 22, 2012 08:04PM Jaebon wrote: Thank you Morgan and LintRoller. I think the anticipation of it coming is getting to me. I have already brought 3 wigs and i love how each gives me a differnent look. However there is nothing like your own hair. Right now i have own hair braided so that i can wear the wigs.  Wow so i guess i will see where i am around day 17.  Is it normal to loose all body hair once it starts?  I hoe not to loose my eyebrows. That would have me in my opinion looking crazy. lol Once the hair loss starts what was the first thing you noticed?  Is the scalp tingling or aching a normal sign when it begins to shed? Im just wondering when mines does start becase i refuse to cut it right now will i just wake up one day and there is hair on the pillow or will i run my fingers thru my hair and have hair in my hands.  Oh boy... this is too much. Im so stressing myself out over this. Thanks again everyone for responding.
Posts.Title: taxotere/cytoxan ? Jaebon Lumpynme

Posts.Content: Apr 22, 2012 10:37PM Jaebon wrote: Thank you Carolinames. I guess i will just prep myself to at least be ready for some type of hair lost by the end of this month.

Posts.Content: Apr 14, 2012 11:53PM - edited Apr 14, 2012 11:55PM by Jaebon when does the metal taste start?  I have started a video diary of my progress and i also write down how i am feeling each day. Today wasa good day. I do feel kind of achy around my shoulders but other than that i have been good today. Lets see what tomorrow brings.
Posts.Title: March/April Chemo T/C x 4 Catherine22 Summer51

Posts.Content: Apr 14, 2012 09:40PM Jaebon wrote: Hello everyone, I recieved my first treatment of taxotere and cytoxan on Friday April 13,2012. I also recieved the neulesta shot. I was given claritain before the shot.So far I can happily say i have not had any side affects. Thank you Jesus.   I do not know what is to come but i will say i am a bit anxious/nervous about it. I do not think i am mentally prepared for hair loss yet. Ive never expierenced fatigue so that will be a new one for me also.  How was everyone else feeling after treatment #1? When did most of the side affects begin?
Posts.Title: March/April Chemo T/C x 4 Catherine22 Summer51
